title: employers in the activities referred to in this Order and of substantial numbers
heading: 1. This Order may be cited as the Industrial Training (Marketing Industry)
text_raw:
1. This Order may be cited as the Industrial Training (Marketing Industry) 

Order 2023.
text_norm: 1 order may cited industrial training (marketing industry) order 2023

title: employers in the activities referred to in this Order and of substantial numbers
heading: 2. The following activities are hereby declared to be designated industrial
text_raw:
2. The following activities are hereby declared to be designated industrial 

activities for the purposes of the Industrial Training Act 1967 (No. 5 of 1967): 

(a) 

the creation, design, researching, testing, planning, management, 
implementation, evaluation and/or analysis of marketing 
initiatives.
text_norm: 2 following activity hereby declared designated industrial activity purpose industrial training act 1967 (no 5 1967) (a) creation design researching testing planning management implementation evaluation analysis marketing initiative

title: employers in the activities referred to in this Order and of substantial numbers
heading: In this Order:
text_raw:
3. 

In this Order: 

"marketing initiatives" means any communication or series of communications, 
in any form, that is or are intended to increase or otherwise affect the level of 
recognition, awareness, appeal or consumption of a particular product, service, 
brand, organisation, opinion, social issue or similar matter.
text_norm: 3 order marketing initiative mean communication series communication form intended increase otherwise affect level recognition awareness appeal consumption particular product service brand organisation opinion social issue similar matter

title: employers in the activities referred to in this Order and of substantial numbers
heading: 4. The provisions of this Order shall not apply to any activity of industry
text_raw:
4. The provisions of this Order shall not apply to any activity of industry 

for which a separate industrial training order is, for the time being, in force. 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
"Iris Oifigiúil" of 13th October, 2023. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [493] 3 

GIVEN under the Official Seal of An tSeirbhís 
Oideachais Leanúnaigh agus Scileanna, 

14 September 2023. 

The Seal of An tSeirbhís Oideachais Leanúnaigh agus 
Scileanna was affixed in the presence of: 

SEAN AYLWARD 

SOLAS Chairman 

a member of An tSeirbhís Oideachais Leanúnaigh agus 
Scileanna, authorised by An tSeirbhís Oideachais 
Leanúnaigh agus Scileanna to act in that behalf. 

ANDREW BROWNLEE 

SOLAS CEO 

a member of An tSeirbhís Oideachais Leanúnaigh agus 
Scileanna, authorised by An tSeirbhís Oideachais 
Leanúnaigh agus Scileanna to act in that behalf. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 4 [493]

title: employers in the activities referred to in this Order and of substantial numbers
heading: (This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal
text_raw:
EXPLANATORY NOTE 

(This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal 
interpretation.) 

An tSeirbhís Oideachais Leanúnaigh agus Scileanna was established under the 
Further Education and Training Act 2013 to promote training in industry and 
commerce. 

This Order defines the activities of the marketing industry in relation to which 
An tSeirbhís Oideachais Leanúnaigh agus Scileanna shall exercise its functions 
in the creation of statutory apprenticeships. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [493] 5
